name: Jim's Revenge
description:
Controls:
- Right Arrow Key to move right
- Left Arrow  Key to move left
- Up, Z, or X Key to jump
- Space or C to shoot (if you have a gun)     
_____________________________________________

     Story:
The Big Bad Boss killed Jim's best friend Bill now Jim is out for revenge
_____________________________________________

     Gun Names:
- Mr. Pew (Blue Gun)
- Shooty Mic Shoot (Red Gun)
- Happiness (Green Gun)
_____________________________________________

     Character Names:
- Jim (Player)
- Bill (Is Dead)
- The Big Bad Boss (Final Boss)
- Enemy (Enemy)
